summary: "Sense and Sensibility" is a 1995 movie directed by Ang Lee, based on Jane Austen's book. It stars Emma Thompson as Elinor Dashwood and Kate Winslet as her sister Marianne. The story follows the sisters, who are rich but suddenly poor, as they look for love and security. Thompson wrote the script, making changes to make it more appealing to modern viewers. The film was a big hit, earning lots of awards and money, and it made Austen's work popular again.
title: Sense and Sensibility (film)
